I among  thousands  of other delivery drivers who work hard keeping the countries industries supplied with their goods, whether it be clothes that we wear or food on our tables, are fed up of our basic human rights being ignored.
We as Delivery Drivers require Toilet Facilities... as do Office workers , even the Farmers Workers in the field are supplied with Toilets.
But yet  we are refused day in and day out by companies refusing our basic human rights to use Toilets  and we are pleading  the Government   to step in and help us with our case.
Thank You
Best Regards

T Duguid
